Package fr.lri.swingstates.canvas.transitions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClickOnShape
    A transition triggered by a mouse button clicked on a CShape.
    ClickOnTag
    A transition triggered by a mouse clicked event on a CShape with a given tag.
    DragOnShape
    A transition triggered by a mouse move event on a CShape with a mouse button down.
    DragOnTag
    A transition triggered by a mouse moved event with a button pressed on a CShape with a given tag.
    EnterOnShape
    A transition triggered when mouse cursor enters on a CShape.
    EnterOnTag
    A transition triggered when the cursor enters in a CShape that holds a given tag.
    EventOnShape
    A transition triggered on a CShape in the canvas.
    EventOnTag
    A transition triggered on a tagged shape.
    LeaveOnShape
    A transition triggered when mouse cursor leaves a CShape.
    LeaveOnTag
    A transition triggered when the cursor leaves a CShape with a given tag.
    MouseOnShape
    A transition triggered by a mouse event on a CShape in the canvas.
    MouseOnTag
    A transition triggered by a mouse event on a tagged shape in the canvas.
    MoveOnShape
    A transition triggered by a mouse moved event on a CShape with no mouse button down.
    MoveOnTag
    A transition triggered by a mouse moved event with no button pressed on a CShape with a given tag.
    PressOnShape
    A transition triggered by a mouse button pressed on a CShape.
    PressOnTag
    A transition triggered by a mouse pressed event on a CShape with a given tag.
    ReleaseOnShape
    A transition triggered by a mouse button released on a CShape.
    ReleaseOnTag
    A transition triggered by a mouse released event on a CShape with a given tag.
    WheelOnShape
    A transition triggered by a mouse wheel event on a CShape with no mouse button down.
    WheelOnTag
    A transition triggered by a mouse wheel event with no button pressed on a CShape with a given tag.
